Name: Wordle 3
About the game: Wordle 3 is the continuation of the Wordle series, featuring 15 new categories and a new mode handwriting input. New categories: textile, hygiene, stationery, size, health, cooking, space, food, olympic games, body, beverages, appearance, emotions, flowers, countries. Train your head, good game!
